live_updates: Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!
Technicians will continue working to restore service and we will have an update in the morning.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Teams remain on site working to resolve the issues as soon as possible.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
61509.summary: Some customers in the The Orchards, Summerside, Walker, and Charlesworth areas of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
61509.title: May 24 - Edmonton (The Orchards, Summerside, Walker, Charlesworth) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
